Articles.Content:
Bro, buy me a Snickers, plz.NO. GET DAT BUTTON AWAY FROM ME NOW!

This button will give you a cookie a girl and a beer but you will die in 1 hour (the time for crunsh the cookie slurp the beer and... and... erm... and what you want to do with the girl)

nope

.. sorry

press button to recieve infinate monah.... in a foreign currency.

Everything's better than rubles. *bomp*

If you press that button you will be able to understand, speak and write any language you come across, but you will sound like a crappy voice synthesiser even in your home language.

Ummm... nope, thanks, try with someone else !

Press it and you will have the capacity to go in a game if you want but if you want to exit the game you need to finish it. Interresting, nah ?

mmmm... okay sure!

i chose interstellaria!

press the button to see the inside of the sun for one NANOsecond!

No, I would probably be incinerated and a nanosecond is to short to see something.

Press the button to shapeshift, but you can only shapeshift into ant sized things.

I would push the button because being small is cool. OR IS IT?

Press the button to get your web browser to work, but you go inactive on the KSP forums for a while.

nope

ptess button to crash any game. at the expense of a malware that DDOS yoyr computer.

Nope thanks. :-)

Press the button to win one of YOUR KSP rocket in real life but you are forced to pilot by yourself with at least once, so if you're a bad pilot... good luck !

Dunno, honestly. Most of my recent spaceships are more sci-fi style than rocketnstyle. And they all use a bunch of mods, so it depends.

Press the button and you will get along with everybody. Including total douchebags.
I press the button, because then people get along with me. Push the button to either have eternal happiness, or be stuck in space. 50/50

BLEEP BLOOP!!!

I have so many achievables!

And now I'm stuck in space. Luckily I can sleep!

Press the button to go LEGOLAND. Except it is a day with no school nationwide and is in Florida.

Edited October 12, 2015 by legoclone09

Would I go to Legoland? No.

Push the button to go to Rome and get a 36 inch pizza

But you have to finish it today or you get attacked my a mob of angry Italians complaining about stereotyping.

uh.. not fancy any pizza..... so nope.

press button to get instant access to all games in the world! but you need to play one game at least once a year!

- - - Updated - - -

No, I would probably be incinerated and a nanosecond is to short to see something.

actually..https://what-if.xkcd.com/115/

I play Klondike at least once a year, so yeah, I'll press it.

Press the button to get a printer that will print any currency legally but has to print 10 bills of Monopoly Money for every bill of real-world currency.

Sure, 1 100$ bill is worth more than all the paper and ink needed for 10 monoploy bucks

The button turns all humans to kerbals, but you do not become one.

PRESS IT IMEDIATELY ! COME HERE LITTLES SUBJECT OF TEST ! I'VE GOT A NEW ROCKET TO TEST RIGHT NOW ! AND ME I'M SAFE !

The button will turn you to kerbal in game and you will pastthe rest of your life to test rockets !

Nah.

The button will half the US military's budget and split the other half between NASA, renewable energy and gun controlling. The bad bit is that it also drops a 20 Kiloton nuke on your head.

IF I'm in a bomb shelter, saving humanity, I press the button.

If you press the button, you will own every video game. But they're the buggy beta versions.

Why not? buggy games are better than no games at all

If you press the button, it makes a satisfying click and you want to press it again.

YES. Wait, it says I want to press it again, that must mean every time I click it I want to do it again, thus creating an infinite loop... *click click click click click...*

If you press the button, your computer gets the best graphics card update available on the market... But the only games you can play on it are text/ASCII based. Hope you like Zork and Nethack!

I shall hit said button, and copy the hardware specifications of it. I will build an identical copy and place it in another computer, configuring out the limitation on setup.

What now?

Press this super amazing magical button for a Yoshi. I didn't say it was friendly.

Uhh.. no to the whole "Turning into an egg" situation.

If you press that button, it will turn everything into minecraft, except you're stuck in the nether!

I shan't press zat button.

Press this button, make SQUAD uber awesome(in all way shape or form), and make modding super easy! One problem, KSP doesn't exist.

I vill not press das button.

Pressing ze button will kill everyone but you, but you become a major religious icon to the next wave of humans.
